title: (PICTURES) Sri Lankan traditional shaman perform Thovil outside Temple Trees as cops look on
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Shaman performed a tradition thovil outside Temple Trees, the official residence of Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa on Sunday (8) night.
`This is part of the call for Prime Minister Rajapaksa, and his brother President Gotabaya Rajapaksa to resign with their government with immediate effect.
The following images were shared on social media. (Courtesy: Thilina Kaluthotage Photography)
(PICTURES) Sri Lankan traditional shaman perform Thovil outside Temple Trees as cops look on
Sri Lanka : President Rajapaksa to consider proposals by BASL
